text: Location of Ethiopia The moths of Ethiopia represent about 700 known moth species. The moths (mostly nocturnal) and butterflies (mostly diurnal) together make up the taxonomic order Lepidoptera. This is a list of moth species which have been recorded in Ethiopia. ==Arctiidae== *Acantharctia nigrivena Rothschild, 1935 *Afrasura indecisa (Walker, 1869) *Afrasura rivulosa (Walker, 1854)
